block_h1_slide2_1: At every product we build, we make our best effords to bring our clients great satisfaction and excellent experience to users.
diadiemcuoi_descript: The website provides full information and photos of wedding&convention centers including banquet halls, menu sets, alacarte menus, added services and promotions. This web-app allows users to book their wedding and convention reservation online. While the CMS allows vendors to manage theirs contents on the website.
clingme_description: This is a front-end project. This project is to design and develop the webapp that allows restaurant owners to manage their business on the website. Restaurant owners can keep track of their sales, their customers and manage their promotions on the website.
noibaiconnect_description: The project includes a website for users to book their taxi service online while the transportation vendor management system allows the website owner to manage its transportation vendors.
backyinvestment_description: The software is built to manage the operation process of BK Logistics’ container yard
pingsky_description: Multi media ebook reader app for smartphones
Galaxygift_description: A Product of SamSung Vietnam. This mobile app provides information related to Samsung’s promotion programs and customer care. It also provides promotions and deals from other areas such as beauty service, culinary, entertainment and shopping.
euroland_description: A mobile app for dislaying stock price chart.
Electronic_descript: A website, owned by Vietnam Ministry of Planning and Investment, allows all other companies to make bidding for government’s projects.
humanrank_description: The website establishes and standardizes job candidates’s qualifications in order to help employers select the right candidates for their organizations.
ducanh_description: He has more than 7 years of experience of software development in various industries. Prior joining HAC, he was project manager for Sigma Solutions. Duc Anh started his coding job when he was at his second year in college. Beside being the technical lead of the company, he is a Senior Full-stack developer.
cong_description: Before joining HAC, Cong was investmentbanking associate for TVS with 7 successful transactions and the total transaction value of more than $100M. Cong holds an MBA from Avila University, Missouri, US.
tuananh_description: Tuan has more than 12 years of experience working as software engineer with his strenth on mobile app development. He has completed more than 40 apps in vaious areas such as social media, sales and marketing, games.
block_descript_hac: We are using agile software process offshore development.
corevalue_detail: Our core values lie in our team members of creative and hard working professionals. We work on a wide range of technologies ranging from open source to custom built solutions. With experience and learning accumulated from many completed projects, we have advanced the process, system &amp technologies that enable us to deliver premium service to our clients. We believe in developing long term strategic partnerships with our clients by delivering service with exceeding expectations and great after-sale services.
block_web_app_development: Our Web Apps team builds web applications, mobile web apps, mobile-optimized sites and native wrapped sites that perform flawlessly across every device.
block_mobile_development: We develop both iOs and Adroid apps in many plaforms with efficient engirneering, high performance and sercure.
block_backend_development: Our talented engineers provide powerful server-side solutions to meet the unique needs of your product.
block_frontend_development: Our front-end development services incorporate UI and UX design and other development activities at every stage of the product development process. We are user-orienred at each development step for very front-end project.
block_address_headoffice: 5B Trung Kinh street, Yen Hoa ward
block_city_sgoffice: Phu Nhuan district, Ho Chi Minh city
block_other_services: We offer technology consultancy service to clients. We also help clients with their product development process, product testing and bug fixing or improving product performance.
